CustomField.description: The date the claim is open from Iko's perspective. While the _case_ may be open earlier than this, the claim isn't open from IKO's perspective until the HOIS has been received, if needed.) In future this date may be set automatically by any number of actions. Jira Ticket: IWCN-823
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date the Claim was opened from IKO's perspective. Generally the date the HOIS was received.
CustomField.label: Status Date: Claim Open
